title: Coffee
steps: Boil 1 cup of water in a kettle.
Add 1 teaspoon of coffee to a coffee filter.
Pour the boiling water over the coffee filter.
Wait for 3-5 minutes for the coffee to brew.
description: A simple yet refreshing cup of cofee to kickstart your day

title: Pasta
steps: Boil 1 cup of water in a kettle.
Add 1 cup of pasta to the boiling water.
Wait for 8-10 minutes for the pasta to cook.
Drain the water and add your favorite sauce.
description: A classic Italian dish that is easy to make and delicious to eat

title: Grilled Cheese
steps: Butter 2 slices of bread.
Place 1 slice of bread in a pan.
Add 1 slice of cheese to the bread.
Place the second slice of bread on top of the cheese.
Cook until the bread is golden brown and the cheese is melted.
description: A classic comfort food that is easy to make and delicious to eat

title: Salad
steps: Wash and chop 2 cups of lettuce.
Add 1 cup of cherry tomatoes.
Add 1 cup of cucumber slices.
Add 1 cup of cheese cubes.
Drizzle with dressing.
description: A fresh and healthy salad that is perfect for any meal

title: Fried Chicken
steps: Season 2 chicken breasts with salt and pepper.
Dredge the chicken in flour.
Dip the chicken in eggs.
Dredge the chicken in breadcrumbs.
Fry the chicken in a pan until golden brown.
description: A crispy and delicious fried chicken that is perfect for any meal

title: Cheese
steps: Butter 2 slices of bread.
Place cheese in between the bread slices.
Grill the sandwich in a pan until golden brown.
description: A classic and delicious grilled cheese that is perfect for any meal

title: Veg Momos
steps: Mix all the ingredients together.
Make small balls out of the mixture.
Steam the momos until they are cooked.
description: A delicious and healthy veg momos that is perfect for any meal

title: Paneer Tikka Masala
steps: Marinate the paneer in spices and yogurt.
Grill the paneer until it is cooked.
Make a masala sauce and add the grilled paneer to it.
description: A delicious and creamy paneer tikka masala that is perfect for any meal

title: Tea
steps: Boil water in a kettle.
Add tea leaves to the boiling water.
Steep the tea leaves for 3-5 minutes.
description: A simple and refreshing tea that is perfect for any time of day

title: Fried Rice
steps: Heat oil in a pan.
Add onions and garlic and sauté until they are translucent.
Add the cooked rice and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes.
Add soy sauce and stir-fry for another minute.
description: A simple and delicious fried rice dish that is perfect for any meal

title: veg Roll
steps: Prepare the filling by mixing together the vegetables and spices.
Lay a spring roll wrapper on a flat surface.
Place a tablespoon of the filling in the center of the wrapper.
Fold the bottom half of the wrapper over the filling, then fold in the sides and roll up the wrapper to form a tight cylinder.
Repeat with the remaining wrappers and filling.
description: A delicious and healthy veg roll that is perfect for any meal

title: Veg Maggi
steps: Boil the maggi noodles according to the package instructions.
Heat oil in a pan and sauté the onions and garlic until they are translucent.
Add the mixed vegetables and cook until they are tender.
Add the cooked noodles to the pan and stir in the soy sauce and tomato ketchup.
Serve hot and garnish with chopped cilantro.
description: A simple and delicious veg maggi recipe that is perfect for any meal

title: Pani Puri
steps: Boil the potatoes and peel them.
Mash the boiled potatoes and mix with the tamarind chutney, green ch utney, and cumin powder.
Fill the puris with the potato mixture and serve immediately.
description: A classic street food snack that is easy to make and delicious to eat

title: Popcorn
steps: Heat the oil in a pan and add the popcorn kernels.
Cover the pan with a lid and cook until the kernels start to pop.
Remove the pan from the heat and let it cool for a few seconds.
Add salt and any other seasonings you like to the popcorn and serve.
description: A classic snack that is easy to make and fun to eat
ingredients: Optional: any other seasonings you like

title: Falooda
steps: Cook the noodles according to the package instructions.
In a separate pan, heat the milk and sugar until the sugar dissolves.
Add the vermicelli noodles to the milk mixture and cook until they are well coated.
Add the rose syrup and cardamom powder to the mixture and stir well.
Serve the falooda in glasses and garnish with chopped nuts and dried fruit.
description: A popular Indian dessert that is easy to make and fun to eat
ingredients: Chopped nuts and dried fruit for garnish

title: Paneer Dosa
steps: Soak the rice and lentils in water for 4-5 hours.
Grind the soaked rice and lentils into a smooth batter.
Add the salt and mix well.
Heat a non-stick pan and pour a ladle of the batter onto it.
Spread the batter evenly and cook until the dosa is golden brown.
Add the paneer filling and fold the dosa in half.
Serve the paneer dosa hot with chutney or sambar.
description: A popular South Indian dish that is easy to make and delicious to eat

title: Idli
steps: Soak the rice and lentils in water for 4-5 hours.
Grind the soaked rice and lentils into a smooth batter.
Add the salt and mix well.
Heat a non-stick pan and pour a ladle of the batter onto it.
Spread the batter evenly and cook until the idli is golden brown.
Serve the idli hot with chutney or sambar.
description: A popular South Indian dish that is easy to make and delicious to eat

title: Paneer Pizza
steps: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
Roll out the pizza dough and place it on a baking sheet.
Spread the pizza sauce over the dough, leaving a small border around the edges.
Add the toppings of your choice, such as cheese, vegetables, and meats.
Bake the pizza in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Remove the pizza from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving
description: A delicious and easy-to-make pizza recipe with a twist of Indian flavors
ingredients: 1 cup of toppings of your choice

title: Mango Juice
steps: Peel and chop the mango into small pieces.
Add the mango pieces to a blender or juicer.
Add a little water to the blender or juicer to help the mango blend smoothly.
Blend the mango until it is smooth and creamy.
Strain the juice into a glass and serve immediately.
description: A refreshing and healthy juice recipe made with mango.

title: Ice Cream
steps: Combine the cream, sugar, and vanilla extract in a bowl.
Whisk the mixture until it is smooth and creamy.
Pour the mixture into an ice cream maker and churn according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Transfer the ice cream to an airtight container and place it in the freezer to hard en.
Once the ice cream is hard, scoop it into bowls and serve immediately.
description: A classic and delicious ice cream recipe
